definitions.title: n. pr. div.
definitions.body: 2Ki 17:30, As.-Bab. deity, worshipped by Babylonians in Samaria; text of name corrupt; Schr:COT ad. loc. (after H. Rawlinson) prop. Zîr-bânit, or Zarpanituv, wife of Marduk (cf. Hpt:Andover Rev., May 1886 Muss-Arnolt:JBL xi (1892), 167), rejecting Sakkut-binûtu = Marduk Dl:Par 215; Jen:ZA iv. 352 makes [[בְּנוֹת]] = banîtu, epithet of Ištar; all doubtful.
